user.title: Add Octo Bed
user.description: Enter your Octo bed's Bluetooth address. With ESPHome Bluetooth proxy, use the bed's address (not the proxy).

pin.title: Enter PIN

error.invalid_address: Invalid Bluetooth address. Use format AA:BB:CC:DD:EE:FF (12 hex characters).
